specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Plain > Chiffon This fabric can easily build up static electricity, especially in dry conditions. To prevent this, make sure the air has enough moisture. Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight. Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Bridal, Blouses, Partywear
